title: The baby carrier with Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively’s seal of approval
text:
Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds have shared the first image of their third baby, snuggled in a baby carrier. The couple revealed their pregnancy news back in May [Photo: Getty]

Months after secretly welcoming their third child together, Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds have shared a photo of their new baby for the first time.

The ‘Deadpool’ actor, 42, headed to Twitter to share an image of himself and his wife, 32, as they enjoyed a day out in Canada with their newborn snuggled between them in a baby carrier.

In the caption, calling for action on a climate policy, the actor seemingly confirms suspicions that the baby is another girl, making her Reynolds and Lively's third daughter.

"I love B.C. I want my daughters to experience the same natural playground I grew up in,” he wrote. “On Oct. 21, the candidate you vote for will SHAPE CLIMATE POLICY. I'm proud of the climate progress made the last 4 years.”

READ MORE: Blake Lively reveals surprise third pregnancy on red carpet

I love B.C. 🇨🇦 I want my daughters to experience the same natural playground I grew up in. On Oct. 21, the candidate you vote for will SHAPE CLIMATE POLICY. I’m proud of the climate progress made the last 4 years. Click https://t.co/gJ8wvRwD2y for voting info. #Capilano pic.twitter.com/a3itOeIqQx — Ryan Reynolds (@VancityReynolds) October 17, 2019

Though it isn’t easy to spot the make of baby carrier the couple are using to carry their newborn, Lively has offered fans a helpful reveal of the products that have guided her through pregnancy and motherhood, including the baby carrier she favours.

Sharing a previously unseen photograph of herself pregnant, Lively explains she has teamed up with Amazon for a sponsored post about her top baby products.

READ MORE: Parents are being warned about Insta-popular cot canopies

“These are the specific products that have helped me with my little ones,” the actress explains.

On the registry's page, Lively has shared that her baby carrier of choice is the Ergobaby Omni 360.

The celebrity-approved carrier has four different positions and can safely hold babies from 12 to 33 pounds.

The carrier is also designed with baby’s hip development in mind, and has a wide wraparound waistband for lower back support, making it a win-win for parents and babies alike.

Ryan and Blake aren’t the only parents who are fans of an Ergobaby carrier. Actress and comedian, Amy Schumer, was recently seen out on a walk with her new baby boy all cosy in an ErgoBaby Omni Cool Air Mesh Carrier.

READ MORE: Concerned parents warn Kim Kardashian over Sids risk

Kate Hudson has been a fan of babywearing since becoming a mother, and now on baby number three she still opts to carry her baby in a carrier. She recently shared a sweet snap of her carrying her daughter, Rani, in a floral Colugo carrier.

Daniel Craig has also been pictured carrying his little one in a baby carrier. His brand of choice is a starry Lillebaby carrier. If it’s good enough for James Bond!
description: The couple have shared the first image of their new baby snuggled in a baby carrier.
